gatewayView.description: Manage API keys for accessing the AI Model Gateway.

providerView.aboutIntro: Provider API keys allow you to use your personal API keys for services like Google AI (Gemini), X.AI (Grok), GigaChat, and Perplexity (Sonar) when making requests through our gateway.
providerView.aboutBenefitsTitle: By storing your own keys, you can:
providerView.aboutBenefit1: Ensure your requests are billed to your own account with these providers
providerView.aboutBenefit2: Use models or features that may not be enabled on our system's default keys
providerView.aboutBenefit3: Prevent hitting rate limits that might be shared across other users
providerView.aboutSecurity: Your API keys are encrypted before storage and securely managed.
providerView.noKeys: No provider keys stored yet. Add your own keys to use them instead of the system defaults.

providerCreateForm.title: Add Provider API Key
providerCreateForm.selectProviderHelper: Select the AI provider for this API key
providerCreateForm.apiKeyHelper: Your API key will be encrypted before storage
providerCreateForm.descriptionHelper: Add a friendly name to help identify this key
providerCreateForm.providerAndApiKeyRequired: Provider and API Key are required
providerCreateForm.notAuthenticated: Not authenticated. Please sign in again.
providerCreateForm.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection.

providerList.title: Stored Provider Keys
providerList.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this {{provider}} API key?
